item.title: Hosting on Github
item.description:
I knew it was possible, but I didn't know it would be that easy. So, to host your static web content on Github you need:

  • A Github account;
  • Create new repository;
  • Create "gh-pages" branch and push there your static web content.

Want a custom domain name?

  • Go buy one;
  • Configure an A record to point to github ip addresses;
  • Add a file named "CNAME" to repository and put your custom domain name in it.

item.title: Winter is coming
item.description: So are my writings on this site. I wonâ€™t set any schedule of posting here. Let it be natural. Nature is a cruel, but gorgeous bitch. It dictates us to build society. No man is an island. This is a primary motivation of sharing ideas and experience here.
